## Command Line and Bash Shell

In this lab you will be working with [Software Carpentry's](http://swcarpentry.github.io/) 
__Unix Shell__ workshop.

[http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/](http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/)

1. Download the materials for the workshop: 

[http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/data/shell-novice-data.zip](http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/data/shell-novice-data.zip)


### House-keeping

If you are using Windows, plase install Git:

[https://git-scm.com/download/win](https://git-scm.com/download/win) 

The installation for windows comes with "Git Bash", which will provide you with the Bash shell to work with the command line.

If you are using Mac, go to `Applications`, then `Utilities`, and click
on the `Terminal` application. This will open a terminal emulator with 
the Bash shell.


### Sections

Go through sections 2, 3, and 4 of the workshop:

2. Navigating Files and directories: [http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/02-filedir/](http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/02-filedir/)

3. Working With Files and Directories: [http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/03-create/](http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/03-create/)

4. Pipes and Filters: [http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/04-pipefilter/](http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/04-pipefilter/)
